title: Longest party in power since 2000 is Nigeria PDP

content.prompt: Since 2000, which of the following political parties has held the executive branch of its respective country for the longest period?

choices.label: The Communist Party of the Russian Federation

unit.text: 4: Party and Electoral Systems and Citizen Organizations

skill.text: Skill 1.D: Describe political systems, principles, institutions, processes, policies, and behaviors of a course country.
